short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Curate, share, and schedule content with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mobibi is a content collaboration hub for teams. Plan, manage, and optimize your content strategy. Create, curate, and schedule content - social, video, blog, or technical - directly through the Mobibi Chrome extension.

With the Mobibi Chrome extension you can start curating, sharing, and scheduling social and blog content with a single click. With the Mobibi Chrome extension, simply click the browser extension icon and the page URL will automatically be copied into the ‘create a post’ box. From there simply select where you would like to post the content - Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube and many more.

Sign up for Mobibi at https://www.mobibi.com.
